dc_title_s: Map of South Africa illustrating Dr. Livingstone's Discoveries (Raster Image)
dc_description_s: MapID: AM_0166. This is a historic regional map of Southern Africa from 1858. This map is part of a selection of digitally scanned and georeferenced historic maps of Africa from the Oscar I. Norwich Collection at Stanford University. More information on this collection can be accessed at: mapsofafrica.stanford.eduThis historic paper map provides an historical perspective of the cultural and physical landscape during this time period. The wide range of information provided on these maps make them useful in the study of historic geography. As this map has been georeferenced, it also can be used as a background layer in conjunction with other GIS data.
